message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to commit to a maximum of $8,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $10,000. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,000.
